text: Adudagi swargada awangba khonjelda asumna haiba eina tare, â€œHoujikti Tengban Mapugi aran-khubham, panggal, Tengban Mapugi leibak amadi mahakki Christtagi matik adu lakle! Maramdi eikhoigi Tengban Mapugi mangda leptuna ahing nungthil eikhoigi ichil inaosingbu maral siramba mahak adu swargadagi hunthakhre.
